products.title: Coffee Body Lotion with Shea Butter for Non-Greasy Moisturization & Soft Skin - 250ml
products.body_html:
[description]

Experience intense moisturization and the energizing fragrance of Coffee in this new and improved Coffee Body Lotion, that leaves skin smooth & soft after every application. The presence of Shea Butter ensures it melts into your skin to offer deep moisturization without making skin greasy. Antioxidant-rich Trio Coffee, Caffeine & Vitamin C together repair and prevent sun damage while also making the skin glow. Give your skin what it really needs post shower - our Coffee Body Lotion that’s suitable for all skin types and seasons.

[/description] [buy]

Moisturizes

Deeply moisturizing Shea Butter along with soothing Coffee and Caffeine in this Body Lotion instantly blend into your skin to provide long-lasting moisturization.

Softens & Smoothes Skin

Get soft and smooth skin all year round thanks to Shea Butter which intensely moisturizes your skin without leaving any greasy residue. The antioxidant-rich trio of Coffee, Vitamin C, and Caffeine soothe and tone your skin, leaving it feeling soft and smooth to the touch.

Non-Greasy

The Coffee Body Lotion is super lightweight and non-greasy. It will lock moisture in your skin without making it sticky or leaving any residue.

[/buy] [use]

Step 1
Pump 3-4 dollops of lotion.

Step 2
Gently massage it over your body.

Step 3
For best results use it daily.

[/use] [ingredients]
Coffee The energizing aroma of Coffee is not only a treat for your senses but is also packed with antioxidants that tone & soothe the skin while fighting free radicals.
Shea Butter Known for its rich moisturizing properties, Shea Butter moisturizes skin at the deepest level, making it soft and smooth.
Vitamin C The powerhouse of antioxidants, Vitamin C helps protect your skin from sun damage, resulting in naturally glowing skin.
Caffeine Caffeine is always at the heart of all our products. It is packed with potent antioxidants that help soothe the skin & repair sun damage.
[/ingredients] [faq]

Which skin type is it suitable for?

The Coffee Body Lotion is formulated to suit all skin types without weighing down your skin or making it feel greasy and sticky.

Can I use this lotion on the face?

We do not recommend using the Coffee Body Lotion on your face. The skin on our body is thicker and therefore requires deeper moisturization. You can pick from our range of moisturizers for face.

Will this lotion clog my pores?

All our lotions are non-comedogenic. So, they moisturize your skin without clogging pores.

Does this body lotion help protect my skin from sun damage?

Yes, the Coffee Body Lotion is enriched with Caffeine and Vitamin C. They have a high antioxidant content that helps fight free radicals and protect your skin from sun damage. Moreover, it helps repair damaged skin cells, restoring your skin’s natural glow.

Can men use this body lotion?

The Coffee Body Lotion is gender-neutral. Both men and women can use it.

Does this lotion have a fragrance?

Yes, this lotion has a rich and energizing aroma of coffee that instantly awakens your senses, making you ready for the day ahead.

Will this lotion make my skin feel sticky?

The Coffee Body Lotion is a lightweight formulation that moisturizes your skin without making it feel sticky or greasy.

Can I use this lotion in summer?

Yes, since the Coffee Body Lotion is non-sticky and non-greasy it is suitable for use in all seasons.

[/faq]

products.title: Eyes On You Serum Concealer | Brightens Under Eye & Reduces Dark Circles - Almond Milk - 5ml
products.body_html:
[description]

Makeup meets skincare in this 2-in-1 everyday serum concealer. It’s not just a quick fix for under eye circles & dark spots but it also reduces their appearance over time with the help of Caffeine & Vitamin C! The lightweight formula effortlessly blends into your skin, leaving behind a flawless finish that's creaseless & non cakey. The brightening concealer offers medium to buildable coverage that is perfect to use everyday. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, it hydrates the skin making it smooth and glowing. Powered by SPF 15 PA ++++, it protects your skin from UV rays. Comes in 4 shades ranging from fair, medium to deep, suited for Indian skin tones.

Fair: 01 Almond Milk
Medium light: 02 Walnut Crush
Medium Olive: 03 Caramel Blend
Deep: 04 Biscoff Shake

[/description] [buy]

Conceals & Brightens

The medium to buildable coverage formula conceals and treats under-eye darkness & blemishes to make your skin look brighter and even-toned.

Creaseless & Non Cakey Finish

Crafted with a feathery touch formula, this lightweight concealer, conceals while providing a flawless natural finish that's creaseless & non cakey.

Reduces Dark Circles

Enriched with antioxidant-rich Caffeine & Vitamin C, it treats under eye dark circles & dark spots to reduce their appearance over time for glowing skin.

[/buy] [use]

Step 1:
Apply the concealer using the applicator to the areas that need coverage.

Step 2:
Gently pat with your fingertip or makeup brush to blend.

[/use] [ingredients]
Caffeine Rich in antioxidants, this ingredient targets the appearance of dark circles and reduces them over time. It also helps in de-puffing the under eye area.
Vitamin C Vitamin C slowly fades out dark spots & blemishes, giving you glowing skin.
Hyaluronic Acid Known to keep the skin hydrated, it ensures smooth application and prevents under eye dryness.
[/ingredients] [faq]

What is a Serum Concealer, and how is it different from regular concealers?

A Serum Concealer is not just your typical concealer. It goes beyond concealing by also providing skincare benefits. While it effectively covers blemishes and dark circles, it also treats these issues, reducing their appearance over time. It's like having a makeup product that doubles as a skincare treatment without the drawbacks of traditional makeup.

Does the Serum Concealer crease or crack during the day?

No, you don't have to worry about creasing or cracking with this formulation. It's designed to stay crease-proof throughout the day, ensuring your makeup looks fresh and flawless.

How many shades is the Serum Concealer available in, and do they suit Indian skin tones?

The Serum Concealer is available in four shades that complement Indian skin tones. Whether you have a fair or deep complexion, there's a shade to match your skin tone and provide the coverage you desire.

Can this Serum Concealer be used to brighten the under-eye area?

Yes, one of the benefits of this Serum Concealer is that it brightens the under-eye area. It helps accentuate your overall look by reducing the appearance of dark circles, giving you a more refreshed and vibrant appearance.

Does the Serum Concealer also hydrate the skin?

Absolutely! The Serum Concealer contains Hyaluronic Acid, which helps hydrate the skin. It won't settle into dry patches, ensuring a smoother finish and maintaining skin hydration throughout the day.

Can I use this serum concealer alone as my sunscreen?

While the Serum Concealer offers sun protection, we recommend that it is best to always use a dedicated sunscreen under the concealer for more comprehensive coverage, especially in intense sunlight.

[/faq]

Experience the rich & chocolaty moisturization of your favorite Choco Body Lotion in a new and improved formula that melts instantly on your skin leaving it super soft & smooth. Deeply Nourishing Cocoa Butter and Sweet Almond Oil give long-lasting moisturization without making your skin feel greasy. Infused with antioxidant-rich Pure Cocoa and Caffeine, this lotion reduces and repairs skin from the effects of sun damage and pollution. Give in to your skin’s chocolate cravings with this nourishing lotion that is perfect for all skin types.

This pack contains:
Choco Body Lotion - 250ml (x2)

[/description] [buy]

Deep Moisturization

Infusion of Cocoa butter & Sweet Almond Oil contribute to its intensive moisturizing benefits and provide skin-deep nourishment.

Soft & Smooth Skin

Unveil soft, smooth skin with the unique blend of Sweet almond oil, and caffeine! They join forces to wrap your skin in antioxidants & provide deep hydration & nourishment.

Non-Greasy

Say farewell to heaviness post moisturization; each ingredient's lightweight formula ensures your skin does not feel oily or heavy.

[/buy] [use]

Pump out 3-4 dollops of lotion

Step 2
Gently massage it over your body.

Step 3
For best results use it daily

[/use] [ingredients]
Pure Cocoa & Caffeine Pure Cocoa & Caffeine in this body lotion are packed with antioxidants that take on the role of a defender, fighting off the signs of premature aging and UV damage. They also aid in maintaining long lasting moisturization and stand as a strong barrier against environmental factors, ensuring your skin stays healthy.
Cocoa Butter Beyond just moisturizing dry patches, leaving them as smooth as silk, Cocoa Butter also targets the appearance of stretch marks and scars by building up skin elasticity.
Sweet Almond Oil Delivers moisture that reaches beneath the surface, making your skin's health its priority. Beyond moisturization, it nourishes your skin, ensuring it radiates a natural, healthy glow.
[/ingredients] [faq]

Is this body lotion suitable for all skin types?

Absolutely! Our body lotion's carefully curated formula is designed to cater to a variety of skin types, ensuring everyone can enjoy its benefits.

Is this lotion scented?

Yes, our lotion has a subtle, sweet, and chocolatey aroma that adds to the overall sensory experience while applying it.

Will this lotion leave a greasy residue?

Not at all. Our lotion’s non-greasy formula, so you can enjoy deep hydration without any sticky aftermath.

Can I use this lotion during the day?

Certainly! Our lotion absorbs quickly, making it suitable for daytime use. Just apply and carry on with your day without worries.

Does this lotion help with stretch marks?

Absolutely. The cocoa butter in our lotion is known to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks over time with consistent use.

How often should I apply this lotion?

For optimal results, apply the lotion daily or as needed to keep your skin moisturized and nourished.

Can I use this lotion in hot and humid weather?

Yes, the lightweight and non-greasy texture of our lotion makes it suitable for use in various weather conditions, including hot and humid climates.

[/faq]

products.title: Natural Loofah
products.body_html:
[description]

mCaffeine’s Natural Loofah is a shower routine essential that’ll keep tempting you to feel the smoothness of clean, freshly scrubbed skin. Made with all-natural plant fiber, the sustainable loofah is gentle and comfortable to use and suits all skin types.

[/description] [buy]

Deeply Cleanses

The Natural Loofah is an effective bath or shower accessory for deep cleansing the skin. It is an excellent exfoliator that helps increase the efficiency of your favorite bathing bar or body wash.

Removes Dead Skin

The Natural Loofah gently brushes off dryness and whisks away dead cells to reveal soft, smooth and healthy skin underneath.

Gentle on the Skin

Made with 100% natural Ramie fiber, mCaffeine’s Natural Loofah is gentle on the skin and does not irritate the skin with any rash or redness.

[/buy] [use]

Step 1:
Wet the Natural Loofah and pour a small amount of body wash onto it.

Step 2:
Gently rub the Natural Loofah over the wet body, especially on areas with dry skin. Rub the loofah in circular movements, and lather it up.

Step 3:
After bath, rinse the Natural Loofah with water and hang to dry.

[/use] [ingredients]
Ramie Fabric mCaffeine’s Natural Loofah is made with 100% all-natural plant fiber, Ramie.
[/ingredients] [faq]

Which skin type is the Natural Loofah suitable for?

The Natural Loofah is suitable to be used on all skin types.

Will the Natural Loofah remove dry and dead skin?

Yes, the Natural Loofah effectively buffs away dry skin and removes dead skin cells, leaving your skin healthy and smooth.

Will the Natural Loofah irritate my skin?

No, the Natural Loofah is very gentle on the skin and is made with plant-based natural fiber which is safe to use on skin.

Is the Natural Loofah 100% natural?

Yes, the Natural Loofah is made with 100% all-natural plant fiber, Ramie, and is free of any synthetic fibers or harsh material.

Is natural loofah good for skin?

It is true that natural loofahs are the best shower tool for cleansing the skin as they expertly cleanse and exfoliate the skin while being resistant to the formation of bacteria. Made with 100% Natural Ramie Fabric derived from plants, mCaffeine’s natural loofah scrubber deep cleanses and removes dead skin while being gentle on the skin.

How long do natural loofahs last?

A natural loofah should be replaced every 3-4 weeks to avoid wear and tear, and the formation of mold or germs. You can find mCaffeine’s Natural Loofah online in India, made of 100% Natural Ramie Fabric that’s derived from plants.

Are loofahs better than washcloths?

Natural Loofahs are more sturdy and durable than washcloths and do a better job of deeply cleansing and exfoliating the skin due to their gentle but grainy texture. Loofahs also contain a handle for better grip and scrubbing technique as opposed to a washcloth. mCaffeine’s Natural Loofah with handle is an excellent choice to efficiently cleanse the skin and remove dead cells for smooth, soft, and healthier skin.

[/faq]

Why does my skin barrier need repairing?

Your skin barrier acts as your body's first line of defense against external factors like pollution, UV rays, and harsh weather. Hydrates Skin

To de-stress skin, it is essential to enrich it with a surge of hydration which is key for the skin’s health and liveliness. [/buy] [use]

Step 1: Hydrate Skin

  • Take a few drops of the Coffee Face Serum and apply gently by patting it onto the face and neck.
  • Massage the serum onto your face and neck in an upward motion till it sinks in. Use every day for best results.

Step 2: Moisturize Skin

  • Follow up with a small dollop of the Coffee Oil-Free Face Moisturizer and apply it evenly on the face and neck.
  • Use every day for best results.

Step 3: Massage with Jade Roller

  • For Jaws, Chin, and Cheeks: Take the larger head of the Jade Roller and start massaging from the center of your chin, along your jaw, then up your cheekbones, and finally roll upwards towards your ear. Repeat 10 times on both sides of the face.
  • For Forehead: Massage the middle of your forehead and roll towards your ears. Repeat in the same motion 10 times then switch to the opposite side of your forehead.
  • For Eyes: Now, take the smaller head of the tool and roll from the inner eye towards the outer corner and then up till the temple, applying medium to light pressure. Repeat 10 times on one eye before switching on to the other eye.
  • The massaging strokes should be gentle on the skin with a steady upwards motion to increase circulation and stimulate lymphatic drainage.
  • Pro tip: Pop the Jade Roller in the fridge to double the dose of de-stressing with its cooling sensation.
[/use] [ingredients]

Step 1: Face Cleansing

  • Pour a small quantity of Coffee Face Wash.
  • Apply on a damp face, and work up a lather.
  • Massage the face for a minute and wash it off thoroughly.

Step 2: Face Exfoliation

  • On a clean face, apply Coffee Face Scrub to the face and spread it to the neck.
  • Gently scrub in circular motions for one minute and wash off with water.

Step 3: Body Exfoliation

  • On the wet body, apply the Coffee Body Scrub and gently scrub in circular motions.
  • Rinse with warm water, pat dry, and moisturize.

Step 4: Face Masking

  • Clean your face with a mild face wash. Apply the Coffee Face Mask with the spatula. Spread it into an even layer.
  • Leave the mask on for 15 to 20 minutes. Rinse it off with lukewarm water.

Is body wash better than soap?

Both Body wash and body soap are used for cleansing purposes, however their formulation and texture differs. Depending on your need, you can pick either of the two.

Which is the best body wash?

The best body wash is one that not only cleanses well and has an inviting aroma but also prevents skin from losing its natural moisture. Coffee Body Wash with Berries is perfect for all skin types as it cleanses, moisturizes and leaves skin soft & smooth.

Is the body wash good to use daily?

Yes, Coffee Body Wash with Berries is formulated to be your daily body cleanser and is gentle on skin. It is rich in antioxidants that cleanse and leave skin soft and glowing. It is recommended to use daily for visibly soft and glowing skin.

How do berries benefit skin?

Berries are great for skin. The body wash is Infused with Berries like Strawberry, Cranberry and Raspberry that are rich in antioxidants and Vitamin C. They reduce signs of aging, protect skin from free radical damage, thereby encouraging healthy and glowing skin. They also hydrate, moisturize and nourish skin, leaving it smooth, soft and glowing.

Is the body wash good for sensitive skin?

Yes, the body wash is suitable for all skin types. It is free from harmful chemicals and toxins. It’s natural and 100% vegan formulation gently cleanses skin while leaving it soft and glowing, making it the best body wash for sensitive skin as well.

Is the body wash sulphate free?

Polyglutamic Acid supports skin barrier function while Prickly Pear extract boosts skin glow. This lightweight, milky smooth serum sinks into the skin to reduce transepidermal water loss and signs of irritation by locking in moisture leaving skin noticeably hydrated, soft & smooth**. Revolutionize your skin barrier’s function with this powerhouse face repair serum!

Why Kombucha?

A rich source of antioxidants and probiotics, Kombucha is known for its intensely hydrating properties that sinks in to repair skin barrier. Regular use of this ingredient helps deactivate the effects of damaging pollutants on the skin while also preventing free radical damage.
Repairs skin barrier function in one day*

Hydrates & Soothes

Polyglutamic Acid Renowned for its ability to improve skin barrier function, this powerful skin hydrator locks moisture in the skin.
Prickly Pear Extract Makes skin supple and smooth while reducing inflammation and enhancing the skin's natural glow.
[/ingredients] [faq]

How does Kombucha extract benefit the skin?

Kombucha extract is rich in antioxidants and acts as a hydration magnet, attracting water to deeply nourish and revitalize the skin. What's truly remarkable is its ability to repair – it reinforces your skin's protective barrier. So, with Kombucha extract, you're embracing fortified skin and a natural glow that shines from within.

Why does my skin barrier need repairing?

Your skin barrier acts as your body's first line of defence against external factors like pollution, UV rays, and harsh weather. Over time, this protective shield can become compromised, leading to issues like dryness, sensitivity, and premature ageing. Factors such as age, environmental stressors, and lifestyle choices can weaken the barrier's function. Repairing it with products like the Kombucha Range helps strengthen this defence, restoring its ability to keep your skin healthy, hydrated, and glowing.

Is the serum suitable for all skin types?

Yes, the serum is designed to suit all skin types, including sensitive skin, as it is lightweight, non-greasy, and free from irritants.

Sheet masks are thin sheets soaked in concentrated serum and shaped like a face to provide instant and intense hydration. Packed with potent ingredients, these masks are crafted to tackle several skin concerns like dryness, pigmentation, acne, dull skin, etc.

Is a green tea sheet mask good for acne?

Green tea works great on people with oily and acne-prone skin. It helps in evacuating excess oil and works wonders on pimples, zits and acne.

Should I wash my face after using a sheet mask?

Sheet masks continue to benefit your skin after you remove it, so don't wash your face immediately after. Take advantage of the hydrating residue left and let it soak into your skin to achieve the best results

How long should the mask be left on for?

Sheet mask should be left on the skin for 15-20 minutes and masking time should not exceed 30 minutes.

Can I use moisturizer after using a sheet mask?

Sheet masks contain hydrating ingredients that retain moisture into the skin. It keeps the skin nourished for a long time after the use, therefore you don’t need to apply moisturizer right after using a sheet mask.

[/faq]

Will the Green Tea & 15% Vitamin C Serum make my skin more sensitive to the sun?

products.body_html:
[description]

An oil-free moisturizer that doubles up as a barrier repair cream! All thanks to Kombucha - a fermented tea that’s packed with antioxidants & known worldwide for its hydrating properties that repair skin barrier by minimizing the effects of pollution & environmental stressors on the skin. Kombucha Hydra Repair Moisturizer is an ultra-lightweight moisturizer that contains Hyaluronic Acid to lock moisture and offer 12 hr of hydration* leaving skin soft & supple**. It contains moisture-retaining Ceramides that strengthen the skin barrier and Peptides that increase skin elasticity. Infused with Vitamin E it also reduces skin pigmentation. Get improved skin softness** & a renewed skin barrier every day!

Why Kombucha?

A rich source of antioxidants and probiotics, Kombucha is known for its intensely hydrating properties that sinks in to repair skin barrier. Regular use of this ingredient helps deactivate the effects of damaging pollutants on the skin while also preventing free radical damage.
12 Hour Hydration*
97.9% Reduction in Skin Dryness**
98.6% Improvement In Skin Softness**

*Based on a consumer study
**Based on dermatological assessment

[/description] [buy]

12 Hour Hydration

Kombucha enhances skin hydration while Hyaluronic Acid deeply hydrates skin. Ceramides & Peptides lock moisture by restoring depleted lipids and keeping skin hydrated for 12 hours*.
*Based on a consumer study

Repairs & Strengthens Skin Barrier

Kombucha is known for repairing skin barrier by locking in moisture. It repairs existing damage while Ceramides & Peptides protect skin from environmental aggressors, by strengthening the barrier.

Antioxidant-Rich

Supercharged with antioxidant-rich Kombucha and caffeine, this moisturizer provides skin with a powerful defence against free radicals and promotes a healthy moisture barrier.

[/buy] [use]

Step 1:
Apply the moisturizer evenly to the face and neck after cleansing.

Step 2:
Gently massage in an upward motion.

Step 3:
Use daily for healthy & plump skin.

[/use] [ingredients]
Kombucha & Caffeine Potent antioxidants Kombucha & Caffeine improve and strengthen skin barrier while enhancing skin hydration to guard skin against free radical damage caused by environmental stressors.
Hyaluronic Acid Deeply hydrates skin by retaining moisture in the skin for a long time. The result is plump and supple skin that’s soft to touch.
Ceramides Repairs and strengthens the skin's moisture barrier, retaining essential moisture for deep hydration. Provides effective moisturization, leaving your skin well-nourished.
Peptide Its moisture retaining ability acts as a moisture magnet for long-lasting hydration while enhancing skin elasticity.
Vitamin E Delivers a protective boost while also reducing hyperpigmentation.
[/ingredients] [faq]

How does Kombucha extract benefit the skin?

Kombucha extract is rich in antioxidants and acts as a hydration magnet, attracting water to deeply nourish and revitalize the skin. What's truly remarkable is its ability to repair – it reinforces your skin's protective barrier. So, with Kombucha extract, you're embracing fortified skin and a natural glow that shines from within.

Why does my skin barrier need repairing?

Your skin barrier acts as your body's first line of defence against external factors like pollution, UV rays, and harsh weather. Over time, this protective shield can become compromised, leading to issues like dryness, sensitivity, and premature ageing. Factors such as age, environmental stressors, and lifestyle choices can weaken the barrier's function. Repairing it with products like the Kombucha Range helps strengthen this defence, restoring its ability to keep your skin healthy, hydrated, and glowing.

Will this moisturizer work for sensitive skin?

Yes, it is formulated with ceramides and other gentle ingredients that help repair and strengthen the skin's barrier, without causing any skin irritation.

How does it protect the skin from environmental damage?

The moisturizer contains Kombucha & caffeine rich in antioxidant content, along with Vitamin E, which creates a protective shield against free radicals and environmental stressors and promotes healthy skin.

Is it suitable for all skin types?

Yes, the Kombucha Hydra Repair Moisturizer is designed to be suitable for all skin types, including dry, oily, combination, and sensitive skin.

How often should I use this moisturizer?

For optimal results, apply the moisturizer twice daily, in the morning and evening, after cleansing your face.

[/faq]

Does the Combo cause any skin irritation?

What should be the frequency of using this combo?

Is Coffee really good for the skin?

Coffee is an excellent exfoliator. It gets the skin rid of dirt and dead skin cells. It also polishes the body to remove tan and improve skin texture. It is a natural source of caffeine that is rich in antioxidants.

What is the main benefit of Naked & Raw Coffee Body Scrub?

To sum up the goodness of our body scrub - ABSOLUTE BODY EXFOLIATION with Pure Arabica Coffee and Cold pressed coconut oil. Bid goodbye to dead skin cells, blackheads, dullness and roughness. Embrace a body that’s soft, smooth and radiant. Our Naked & Raw Coffee Body Scrub will unclog all pores and reduce ingrown hair. It will allow better absorption of moisturiser and thus improve your skin nourishment.

Why should I exfoliate at all?

Our body sheds dead skin cells on a regular basis, which if not removed can lead to a host of skin issues like dullness, roughness and patchy skin. We need to regularly unclog the pores to keep the skin fresh. Exfoliation helps in the process. When you regularly exfoliate your skin it reduces the chances for your skin to break out. Exfoliation also helps to brighten up our skin and improves the performance of other skin care products such as body wash and moisturiser since it creates conditions for better absorption.

How is Coffee Body Scrub different from homemade body scrubs?

The Coffee Body Scrub provides a hassle-free experience as compared to homemade scrubs. Apart from that, our original Coffee Body Scrub is loaded with Pure Arabica Coffee which makes it much more effective for exfoliation & tan removal.

How to use Coffee Body Scrub to get rid of dead skin & tan?

It’s simple to use our Coffee Body Scrub. You just need to apply it on your wet body and scrub in gentle circular motions. Once done, you just need to wash it off and apply any body lotion to remove tan to give naturally glowing skin.

Where Should I use the Coffee Body Scrub?

Coffee Body Scrub is a full body scrub. It is recommended for the whole body, except the face. While applying the scrub, you should focus more on darker areas of the body such as the neck, knees, elbows, underarms and feet for complete exfoliation.

Who is it suitable for?

Coffee Body Scrub is perfect for both men & women and it works amazingly well, leaving behind smooth skin.

What is the difference between Face & Body Scrub?

The difference between the two is that face scrub is gentler than body scrub. Hence, we recommend you to choose a face scrub to exfoliate your face as its skin is more sensitive than the body.

Why coffee and coconut for body scrub?

Coffee stimulates blood flow, is an effective exfoliator, reduces cellulite and fights free radicals. Coffee also helps to reduce the inflammation that is caused by various skin issues such as acne, eczema and psoriasis. The various antioxidants and antimicrobial properties in coffee help in fighting various skin related diseases and infections. Coconut is a natural moisturiser. It reduces the dryness in our skin and hydrates it well. It goes deep in the pores and deep cleanses for a fresher skin. It reduces any irritations or itchiness and creates a soft and smooth texture. Coconut is also known for diminishing the signs of ageing such as wrinkles and reducing the temporary redness if any. Thus the blend of coconut and coffee makes it a perfect body scrub.

How many times do I scrub in a week?

Scrubbing is advised twice a week for effective and visible results. You can scrub your skin at any time of the day but it is advisable to do body scrub early in the morning when the skin is fresh and healed from sleep. You can also scrub your skin if you feel abundant dust or dirt settled on the surface. After scrubbing it is advisable to moisturize skin for proper nourishment.

What skin type is it suitable for? Can I use it for sensitive skin?

The Naked and Raw coffee body scrub uses very fine particles of coffee and is suitable for normal to oily skin types. For dry skin, we recommend using a moisturiser after the use for body scrub. The moisturiser will provide the right hydration and nourishment for your dry skin. You can use the Naked and raw coffee body scrub for sensitive skin too. It does not consist of any harmful chemicals and does not create any irritation or itching sensation. It is paraben free and is made from 100% organic ingredients.

What do I need to do before and after scrubbing?

Before scrubbing, gently cleanse your face/body with a mild cleanser. This will help to get rid of any leftover makeup or excess oil. Cleansing also helps to reduce the impact of pollutants and dead skin cells on our face. Seal the deal after scrubbing with a moisturiser or body lotion to close the open pores and to provide added nourishment to the skin. Moisturising your skin will help you to avoid extreme skin conditions such as dryness or oily ness. Using skin moisturiser on a daily basis after body scrub can help get rid of face spots and skin scars.

What do I do if the water gets in the jar?

We advise you to keep the product in a cool and dry place. Should your scrub come in contact with water, fear not, just scoop out the damp portion out of the jar and use it. Avoid leaving the damp part in the jar to protect the product. Too much water kept in the jar can make the salt particulates liquify and become soft.

How safe and ethical is it?

Our products are SLS and Paraben free! They are also 100% Vegan. Only the purest natural products are used. We do not use any chemical products while making our products. All the ingredients are 100% organic. Thus you are not likely to experience any skin problems such as irritation or itchiness by using our products. Thus, making our products very safe for skin consumption. They are also not tested on animals, and cruelty-free! Thus 100% ethical too.

Can I use the body scrub on face?

The skin on our face is gentler than the rest of the body. It thus needs extra care. We recommend you use our Naked and Raw Face Scrub for the purpose to avoid any discomfort. The face scrub will exfoliate your face skin and help to get rid of all the dust and dirt settled in your skin pores. It will also make your skin much smoother and softer by removing all the dead skin particles. The face scrub reduces the appearance of the signs of ageing such as wrinkles and fastens the process of fading away scars and face spots.

Can I use body scrub after an intense workout or any other physical activity?

Yes, the body scrub can be used after an intense workout or any other physical activity. We would recommend you use a mild cleanser before using the scrub for faster and effective results. The cleanser will get rid of any sweat or bacteria on the surface of your skin and thus avoid the clogging of pores. Leaving sweat on skin after working out can create itchiness and irritation sensations.

I lost my Naked & Raw Coffee scoop. What do I do?

No worries! You can use any dry non-metallic scoop to take out the product from the jar. Avoid any contact of moisture with the product to keep it safe! Moisture can spoil the quality of your product so make sure to use a clean and dry scoop.

Do I use body scrub before or after soap?

Everyone has their own shower habits and tastes, but when it comes to dipping into your scrub, there are some guidelines to follow. When used correctly, your sweet-smelling exfoliant has a lot of advantages for your skin. You should use your body scrub after you've used your body soap to get the most out of it. Body scrub routines are generally based on one’s personal preference. We've heard of folks utilising body scrub both before and after using body soap. The best results are seen when one cleans the body with soap before applying scrub, it then gives the required exfoliation.

What does body scrub do?

Body scrub is an essential beauty product which helps in maintaining the lustre of the skin. A good body scrub is said to eliminate the dead skin cells, stimulating blood cells and cleansing the skin. What is the use of a face mist?

[/ingredients] [faq]

What are the types of body exfoliators?

Body exfoliation can be done with physical or chemical exfoliants depending on the need and type. Scrubs are a form of physical exfoliation for skin, while AHAs and BHAs are forms of chemical exfoliation. Physical exfoliation involves manually removing dead skin cells,while chemical exfoliation breaks down the bonds between dead skin cells and healthy skin, making it easier to wipe away dead cells.

Is chemical exfoliation better than physical exfoliation?

Chemical exfoliants and physical exfoliants both exfoliate skin. Physical exfoliants consist of tiny particles that buff away dead skin cells manually, while chemical exfoliants resurface skin by dissolving the bond between dead skin cells with the help of alpha and beta-hydroxy acids or fruit enzymes. You can include either of the above in your skincare routine depending upon the skin issue to be addressed and your skin type.

Will 10% AHA Body Wash treat Keratosis Pilaris?

10% AHA body wash is a concentrated blend of Glycolic Acid & Lactic Acid) that gently exfoliates the outer damaged layer of the skin. Regular use of this body wash will help reduce Keratosis Pilaris (KP) as well as strawberry skin.

Can the exfoliator be used on the face?

No, Body Exfoliator with AHA- 10% & Green tea should not be used on face.Since facial skin is more sensitive and thinner than the rest of the body, this formula works best for body exfoliation. Do a patch test on your body before you use it.

Is it good to use Green Tea & 10% AHA Body Exfoliator everyday?

No. Use Green Tea & 10% AHA Body Exfoliator only once or twice a week to experience smooth and soft skin everyday. You can see visible results after one single use.

Can it be used on sensitive skin?

Yes, Green Tea & 10% AHA Body Exfoliator is a gentle yet effective exfoliating formula that is free from harmful chemicals and toxins. Green Tea and Caffeine soothe skin, Niacinamide hydrates and nourishes, making the formula suitable for all skin types. It is also 100% Vegan.

[/faq]

What are the types of body exfoliators?

Body exfoliation can be done with physical or chemical exfoliants depending on the need and type. Scrubs are a form of physical exfoliation for skin, while AHAs and BHAs are forms of chemical exfoliation. Physical exfoliation involves manually removing dead skin cells, while chemical exfoliation breaks down the bonds between dead skin cells and healthy skin, making it easier to wipe away dead cells.

Is chemical exfoliation better than physical exfoliation?

Chemical exfoliants and physical exfoliants both exfoliate skin. Physical exfoliants consist of tiny particles that buff away dead skin cells manually, while chemical exfoliants resurface skin by dissolving the bond between dead skin cells with the help of alpha and beta-hydroxy acids or fruit enzymes. You can include either of the above in your skincare routine depending upon the skin issue to be addressed and your skin type.

Is 2% BHA-Salicylic Acid Body Exfoliator suitable for sensitive skin?

2% BHA - Salicylic Acid Body Exfoliator is a blend of exfoliant, 2% BHA- Salicylic Acid and Green Tea. The gentle yet effective formula helps to deeply cleanse impurities from pores while soothing skin, leaving skin acne-free and soft. It is suitable for all skin types.

Can the exfoliator be used on the face?

No, 2% BHA - Salicylic Acid Body Exfoliator should not be used on the face. Since facial skin is more sensitive and thinner than the rest of the body, this formula works best for body exfoliation. Do a patch test on your body before you use it.

Can the 2% BHA - Salicylic Acid Body Exfoliator be used daily?

No. Use 2% BHA - Salicylic Acid Body Exfoliator only once or twice a week to experience acne free skin. You can see visible results after one single use.

[/faq]

Which is better SPF 30 or SPF 50?

SPF stands for Sun Protection Factor; it determines how well the sunscreen protects your skin from the harmful rays of the sun. An SPF 30 sunscreen is apt for someone who spends most of their time indoors and/or commutes by car. However, those who spend more time outdoors can pick a SPF 50 sunscreen.

How to choose the right sunscreen?

There are several factors you need to consider while choosing a sunscreen. Ensure that the formula is lightweight and does not clog pores, offers protection from both UVA and UVB rays, does not leave a white cast and contains effective ingredients. The Coffee Sunscreen Lotion has all these benefits and more! It is also non-greasy, water resistant, blends easily and is suitable for all skin types.

Can I apply sunscreen directly on the face?

Yes, in fact applying sunscreen directly on a cleansed face will offer maximum protection. Apply the Coffee Sunscreen Lotion as the last step of your morning skincare routine and reapply every 2-3 hours to stay protected.

Should I apply sunscreen at home?

Sunscreen should be applied every day, irrespective of whether you’re home or outdoors. This is because the UV rays of the sun are so powerful that they can easily pass through glass windows. To stay protected, it is best to apply sunscreen every single day.

What does water resistant mean?

The Coffee Sunscreen Lotion is water resistant and has been tested to stay for 80 minutes* when in contact with water.

products.title: Gua Sha - Green Quartz
products.body_html:
[description]

Hit the skin-gym to tone and firm your face with Gua Sha- a small facial massaging stone. It de-puffs skin, improves elasticity and tones skin. The regular-use forecast tells us that you’ll be hooked to Gua Sha for good!

[/description] [buy]

Skin Toning and De-puffing

The Gua Sha is made with Aventurine, the Green Quartz crystal which tones the face, stimulates blood circulation and de-puffs skin resulting in healthier, flushed looking skin.

Improves Skin Elasticity

Regular use of the Gua Sha results in improved skin elasticity, making the skin firm and supple. It also stimulates lymphatic drainage, purifying the skin from within.

De- stresses and Soothing Sensation

The Gua Sha de-stresses and relaxes facial muscles leaving your skin fresh and energized! It has an addictive cooling and soothing effect on your skin that will surely get you hooked!

[/buy] [use]

Step 1:
First apply a rich serum or moisturizer of your choice and evenly spread it out on the face.

Step 2: For Chin and Jaw

  • Take the larger curved edge of the Gua Sha and fit it under your chin, start massaging from the centre, going gently upwards along the jawline till your earlobes.
  • Repeat this motion 5-6 times on both sides of the face.

Step 3: For Cheeks

  • Moving on to the cheek, use the flat side of the stone to gently move in an upwards motion across the cheek.
  • Repeat this motion 5-6 times on both the cheeks.

Step 4: For Under Eyes

  • Now take the narrower edge of the stone and very gently massage the under-eye area moving upwards from the inner to the outer corner.
  • You can also massage along the brow bone in an outward motion.

Step 5: Care

  • Deep clean the Gua Sha once or twice a week to avoid the build-up of bacteria by simply cleaning it with cold water and gentle soap or face wash. Gently pat it dry or let it air dry by placing it on a clean soft cloth or towel.
  • Avoid using hot water on it as high temperatures tend to strip Green Quartz of its protective layers.
  • Do not use chemical cleaners or alcohol on the roller as that can cause damage to the product.
[/use] [ingredients]
Green Quartz Made with Aventurine, the Green Quartz crystal is loaded with positive energy and vitality. Gua Sha is made from natural stone. The colour of natural stones may vary.
[/ingredients] [faq]

How often can Gua Sha be used?

Gua Sha can be used twice a day, once in the morning and once in the evening after cleansing your face. Morning works best for treating puffiness and toning the skin, while in the evening the tool is helpful for relaxing the facial muscles. However, you can use it as many times as you like, whenever your face is in need of some toning, de-puffing or a relaxing massage

It's best to use Gua Sha regularly for long-term skin benefits such as improving skin elasticity & skin toning.

Can it be used on the neck?

Yes, Gua Sha can be used on the neck and even on shoulders.

Start by positioning the flat side of the tool on top of the shoulder, and stroke it upwards along the side of the neck, up till your ear. Then to tone the neck, glide the tool up towards the jaw, starting at the base of the neck, near the collarbone.

Should I apply any products before or after using Gua Sha?

It is essential to apply a face moisturizer or serum before using Gua Sha. This prevents any pulling or tugging of the skin while massaging your face with the tool. In addition, Gua Sha helps in better penetration and absorption of the product.

Pair your Gua Sha with the Coffee Face Serum or Coffee Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for a smooth and enriching face massage.

You need not apply any product after using the Gua Sha tool. However, if you’ve applied a serum before the massage, you may follow it up with a moisturizer.

For how long can it be used on the face?

A Gua Sha facial massage should take about 2-5 minutes. This depends on the number of massage repetitions and on how many areas of the face and neck you’re covering. You should ideally massage each area 10 times in a gentle upwards motion.

Can it be refrigerated?

Yes, the Gua Sha tool can be refrigerated for extra cooling and soothing effects on the skin.

What is the Gua Sha made of?

The mCaffeine Gua Sha is made of Green Quartz (Aventurine).

Which skin type is it suitable for?

Gua Sha is suitable for all skin types.

What are the benefits of Gua Sha?

mCaffeine’s Gua Sha - Green Quartz is a firming face tool with immense benefits for the skin. Gua Sha tones the skin, reduces puffiness and improves skin elasticity. Aiding in better product absorption, the Gua Sha stone also de-stresses the facial muscles and has a soothing effect on the skin.

Do Gua Sha stones really work?

Regular, everyday use of the Gua Sha facial tool results in firm, toned skin and better skin elasticity. A massage with the Gua Sha stone is also an effective way to relieve tension in the face & reduce puffiness. The tool also helps in better absorption of the face care product it’s being paired with, hence its long-term use also results in enhanced products benefits.

Do I wash my face after Gua Sha?

No, it is not necessary to wash your face after Gua Sha. It is essential to apply a face moisturizer or serum before using the Gua Sha stone. This prevents pulling or tugging of the skin while massaging your face with Gua Sha. In addition, Gua Sha helps in better product absorption of the product, hence it is beneficial to not rinse your face after Gua Sha. However, it is important that you massage your face with a clean & sanitized Gua Sha stone.

Are Gua Sha results permanent?

Gua Sha for face care results in long-term skin benefits with regular use. One of the best Gua Sha in India, the mCaffeine Gua Sha - Green Quartz effectively firms and tones the skin, and improves skin elasticity. The tool also has instant skin benefits such as relaxation, de-puffiness, and improved blood circulation.

How do you know if Gua Sha is real?

The mCaffeine Gua Sha stone is made with 100% Aventurine - a natural Green Quartz crystal that is loaded with positive energy and vitality. Since the stone is completely natural and thus its color is subject to vary.

[/faq]

Are scalp scrubs good for dandruff control

Scalp scrubs provide scalp exfoliation which is a key haircare step for removing dandruff. An effective scalp scrub should remove dead cells, dandruff, and other build-ups for good hair health. mCaffeine’s Coffee Scalp Scrub is proven to remove 99% of dandruff-causing microbes and is supercharged with exfoliating Coffee Powder that efficiently removes build-up and dead skin cells.

Is dandruff caused by dry or oily scalp?

In the dry scalp, the skin gets irritated and flakes off, while dandruff occurs when there’s too much oil on the scalp. However, both result in an itchy scalp with whitish flakes. A few common causes of dandruff are oily skin, not shampooing enough, or even excess humidity in the air. But one need not worry as dandruff can be removed by regularly using an exfoliating scalp scrub for oily hair such as the mCaffeine Coffee Scalp Scrub that removes dirt, oil, dead skin cells, and 99% of dandruff-causing microbes.

How do you get rid of thick layers of dandruff?

Thick layers of dandruff is often a result of a congested and oily scalp which may lead to constant scratching. This can be taken care of by using mCaffeine’s best Scalp Scrub regularly, as directed along with a proper hair care regime. Enriched with Coffee Powder, the scrub effectively exfoliates the scalp by removing dirt, oil, dead cells, and 99% of dandruff-causing microbes. Can you get rid of cellulite and stretch marks?

For most people, stretch marks and cellulite are a part of their genetic code, but they can be reduced with the use of the right products and regular exercise that helps tone the body. Caffeine is one of the only two topical ingredients that is scientifically proven to reduce cellulite and stretch marks. The mCaffeine Cellulite & Stretch Mark Reduction Duo is made with caffeine-rich Coffee and targets cellulite and stretch marks reduction for smooth and polished skin.

Is stretch marks and cellulite the same thing?

Cellulite is the dimpled and uneven appearance of skin that appears when fat cells accumulate underneath the skin and push against it. Stretch marks show as thin scar-like lines resulting from the rapid stretching of the skin that takes place with age or weight fluctuation. Cellulite mostly occurs on the lower parts of the body like thighs, buttocks, and hips while stretch marks mostly appear on the back, belly, arms, and buttocks.

Does mCaffeine reduce stretch marks?

mCaffeine’s Coffee Body Polishing Oil and Coffee Body Scrub is top-rated cellulite and stretch mark reduction treatment. It is made with Coffee that is rich in caffeine – one of only two topical ingredients scientifically proven to reduce cellulite and stretch marks. The antioxidant-rich, coffee-infused duo tones and polishes the skin to reduce the appearance of stretch marks over time.

Can Cellulite turn into stretch marks?

No, Cellulite and Stretch Marks are two different skin-related concerns. They can be effectively reduced by using stretch marks and cellulite treatment that is rich in caffeine. The mCaffeine Stretch Mark and Cellulite Reduction Duo is made with caffeine-rich Coffee that tones and polishes the skin to reduce the appearance of cellulite and stretch marks over time.
